snippet: A former employee of Universal Entertainment Corp filed a criminal complaint against Kazuo Okada, the Japanese firm's billionaire founder, alleging he ordered the payment of bribes to advance a still-unfinished casino project in the Philippines....

headline.print_headline: Former Universal Staff Files Criminal Complaint Against Casino Tycoon Okada
headline.main: Former Universal Staff Files Criminal Complaint Against Casino Tycoon Okada

lead_paragraph: A former employee of Universal Entertainment Corp filed a criminal complaint against Kazuo Okada, the Japanese firm's billionaire founder, alleging he ordered the payment of bribes to advance a still-unfinished casino project in the Philippines.
